author: Staff Reporter
text:
A prisoner at the Puzhal Prison died after he allegedly suffered an epileptic attack on Wednesday afternoon. According to the police, Siva, a resident of Pallavaram was arrested by the railway police in Tambaram some months ago. While having bath on Wednesday, he had an epileptic attack following which he slipped and fell. He was rushed to the hospital in an ambulance but died on the way.

Gold, cash stolen

Over 25 sovereigns of jewellery and Rs 2 lakh in cash were stolen from a house in Madhavaram on Wednesday morning. According to the police, Punitha Devi, was at her home at Shastri Nagar in Madhavaramon, on Wednesday morning when the incident took place. After her husband Shah left to work and her children to school, she was talking to her neighbour when an unknown person is said to have entered the house and looted the valuables. The police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Prisoner dies at Puzhal after an epileptic attack
